tool_description: Handwriting Recognition OCR - Convert scanned handwritten notes into editable text.
name: Pen to Print - Handwriting OCR
title: Pen to Print - Handwriting OCR

api_list.name: recognize

parameters.name: includeSubScan
parameters.description: integer [0/1] indicate whether the return value should include images of the split lines.

parameters.name: srcImg
parameters.description: file object of the image (jpg or png format) to be scanned.

parameters.name: Session
parameters.description: GUID string to represent the session. Will appear in billing for tracking purposes.
